title: YouWorkForThem Matter
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012155807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Matter_specimen_5424.jpg)

Just released over at YouWorkForThem. [Matter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012155807/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0264) is an Open Type font designed with mid-century modern corporate display fonts, Xerox, and scientific textbooks in mind. Hope you like it!
